params.index: index of staking to claim rewards

constructor.details: Set the staking & reward token contract and owner of this smart contract.

params.index: index of staking to get the detail
params.staker: address of user to get the staking info
address of user to get the staking info

params.index: index of staking to be checked

params.staker: an address to query number of times it staked

returns._0: number of times a particular address has staked

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

recoverERC20(address,uint256).details: Recovers ERC20 tokens accidentally sent to the contract

params._token: Address of the ERC20 token to recover

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setClaimingContract(address).details: Only owner can call this function; should check non-zero address

setStakingEnabled().details: Once staking become enable, cannot disable it back again.

setToken(address).details: Only owner can call this function; should check non-zero address

params._token: address of the staking token to be updated

params.amount: amount of token to be staked

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdraw(uint256).details: when break the staking before time is up, the rewards will be removed

params.onlyClaimable: bool value that represents whether will withdraw only claimable staking or not
bool value that represents whether will withdraw only claimable staking or not

claimRewards(uint256).notice: Claim the rewards about the staked token

getStakeInfo(address,uint256).notice: Get the info of a particular staking

getStakeInfoArray(address).notice: Get the info of a particular staking

isStaked(address,uint256).notice: Check a particular stake is still on the state of staking or not

numStakes(address).notice: How many stakes a particular address has done

setClaimingContract(address).notice: Set the address of claiming contract

setStakingEnabled().notice: Enable staking; this is called by only owner. Owner will enable staking as soon as presale is over.

stake(uint256,uint256).notice: Stakes the token; the token is transferred from staker's wallet to this contract, and the staking duration is calculated in months.

withdrawAll(bool).notice: withdraw all staked token; it is recommended to use withdrawBatch function than this.

withdrawBatch(uint256,uint256,bool).notice: withdraw staked token between pointed indexes.
